metadata.description: Christos Gage is joined by international superstar artist Mario Alberti to bring you the most misunderstood team of all time meeting the most misunderstood super hero of all time in a 4-part mystery that starts in the early days of the Marvel Age and winds its way through to today! In Part One, Kraven the Hunter and the Blob attack the world's strangest teens, while deep in the background an even greater threat watches…and waits.
metadata.name: X-Men/Spider-Man
